tool_description: Analyzes channel performance data and provides optimization recommendations for improving survey distribution effectiveness and response rates.

performance_data_id.description: Performance data identifier from Channel Performance Tracker

optimization_goals.description: Optimization objectives: response_rate, delivery_rate, cost_efficiency, engagement

analysis_depth.description: Analysis depth level: basic, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid performance data ID: performance_data_id does not exist or contains insufficient data for optimization.
Invalid optimization goals: Use supported goals [response_rate, delivery_rate, cost_efficiency, engagement].
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive] for analysis_depth parameter.
usage: Provide performance_data_id from a Channel Performance Tracker session. Optionally specify optimization_goals and analysis_depth for customized recommendations.

optimization_id.description: Unique identifier for the optimization analysis

expected_improvement.description: Expected improvement percentage from implementing recommendations
